data.title: Angel C Planells MS RDN FAND on LinkedIn: The Hot Sauce (Ep 30)
authors: Angel C Planells MS RDN FAND
data.meta_description:
Episode 30 of "The Hot Sauce 🥵" features Hernando Planells

One of the world’s most well-traveled and experienced coaches, Hernando has built a career and…
data.text:
🍽️ Exploring the Realities of Intermittent Fasting & Nutrition 🏃♂ If you've been curious about intermittent fasting, or if you're an endurance athlete thinking about how your diet affects your performance, you'll want to tune in to this week's episode of 𝙎𝙝𝙞𝙛𝙩 𝙬𝙞𝙩𝙝 𝙀𝙡𝙚𝙣𝙖 𝘼𝙜𝙖𝙧. We're thrilled to bring you a deep dive into the world of health and nutrition with our special guest, James LeBaigue sports nutritionist, advanced clinical practitioner, and a beacon in the vegetarian food scene. 🔹 Intermittent Fasting: Myth Vs. Reality Are the buzz and the health claims around intermittent fasting built on solid ground? James breaks down the concept, dismissing the notion of any unique magic behind it, and emphasizes its role as a potential tactic for managing calorie intake. Discover why it might be the right (or wrong) approach for you. 🔹 Can Skipping Meals Boost Performance? Elena shares how intermittent fasting has changed her relationship with food, but James provides a cautionary perspective, especially for our endurance athlete listeners. If you're pushing your limits, you'll want to hear why fasted training might not be your friend. 🔹 Body Wisdom: Learning to Listen Diet isn't just about routines and regimes. Both Elena and James discuss the importance of tuning in to your body's signals – a simple, profound wisdom that could revolutionize the way you eat. 🔹 Nurturing a Healthier Community Longing for more interaction and guidance? Reach out to James at hurrythefoodup.com and nutritiontriathlon.com. He's on a mission to help you savor the moment and lead a healthier, more balanced life. 🔹 The Tough Love of Self-Accountability James is all about tough love when it comes to reaching your fitness and nutrition goals. This discussion will empower you to take ownership of your journey with actionable advice that transcends the dinner plate. 🔹 A Veggie-Powered Life Discover how "Hurry The Food Up" is changing the game with quick, healthy vegetarian recipes, and learn about James' unique personal routine that keeps him on top of his game. 🔹 The Global Food Challenge Dive into an eye-opening conversation about the accessibility (or lack thereof) of quality nutrition, and why not all vegetables are created equal – especially when socioeconomic factors enter the equation. This episode is packed with insights, stories, and practical advice for anyone looking to readjust their food perspective and optimize their health. Don't miss it, and remember, the right kind of nourishment is not just about what's on your plate but also what's in your heart and mind. Tune in, get inspired, and let's explore the space of nutrition together! Until next time, keep exploring, https://lnkd.in/epZXAK7C

Nine ways to lose weight without counting calories. In its simplest form, weight loss occurs when you’re in a calorie deficit. You are taking in less energy than you burn. Counting calories is a great way to manage this but it's tedious for a lot of people and many people don't want to do it. In the latest episode of my Bite-Sized weight loss podcast, I discuss 9 tips and strategies to lose weight without counting calories. They are practical, easy to use, and require little to no extra time out of your day. By practicing a combination of these healthy habits you can get into and stay in a calorie deficit with less stress, less time, and no number-crunching. Check out the episode here: https://lnkd.in/g48WaEJr #weightloss #habits #nutrition #fitness #personaltrainer

Think calorie deficits are the key to weight loss? Think again! Many diets focus solely on restricting calories, but did you know this can harm your muscle mass and set you up for unwanted weight gain later on? In this quick video, we’ll expose the risks of staying in a calorie deficit for too long and show you the real key to ending the cycle of yo-yo dieting once and for all. ➡️ Tune in to the full episode, "Lose Weight in Your 40s: No More Counting Calories," on The Thriving Metabolism podcast. Available on all major podcast platforms or through the link in my bio! Dealing with stubborn weight and looking for a more sustainable approach to weight loss? 👇 Comment “MASTERCLASS” below to access my FREE Weight Loss Masterclass! #weightloss #musclemass #nutrientdensefoods #weightgain #restriction
